title: Piute Spring
text: Piute Spring is a <a href="Spring%20%28hydrology%29">spring</a> in a <a href="canyon">canyon</a> in the <a href="Piute%20Range">Piute Range</a> of <a href="San%20Bernardino%20County%2C%20California">San Bernardino County, California</a>. It lies an elevation 3,025 feet / 922 meters at the head of <a href="Piute%20Creek">Piute Creek</a>. Piute Creek runs from Piute Spring down a canyon through the Piute Range east then northeast downstream to where its waters sink into the sands of a <a href="Arroyo%20%28creek%29">wash</a> near the <a href="ruins">ruins</a> of <a href="Fort%20Piute">Fort Piute</a>. From there that wash turns east widening into an <a href="alluvial%20fan">alluvial fan</a> of <a href="Braided%20river">braided washes</a> that terminate in <a href="Piute%20Wash">Piute Wash</a> in the middle of <a href="Piute%20Valley">Piute Valley</a>.
